conditions.name: Common Cold
conditions.description: Viral infection of the upper respiratory tract
conditions.recommendation: Rest, stay hydrated, and monitor symptoms. Seek medical attention if symptoms worsen.

conditions.name: Influenza (Flu)
conditions.description: Viral infection affecting the respiratory system
conditions.recommendation: Rest, stay hydrated, and consider antiviral medication. Seek medical attention if symptoms are severe.

conditions.name: Hypertension
conditions.recommendation: Immediate medical consultation required. Monitor blood pressure regularly.

conditions.name: Asthma
conditions.description: Chronic respiratory condition causing breathing difficulties
conditions.recommendation: Use prescribed inhaler and seek medical attention if symptoms worsen.

conditions.name: Gastroenteritis
conditions.description: Inflammation of the stomach and intestines
conditions.recommendation: Stay hydrated, eat bland foods, and rest. Seek medical attention if symptoms persist.

conditions.name: Migraine
conditions.description: Severe headache often accompanied by nausea and sensitivity to light
conditions.recommendation: Rest in a dark, quiet room. Consider pain medication and seek medical attention if severe.

conditions.name: Pneumonia
conditions.description: Infection that inflames air sacs in one or both lungs
conditions.recommendation: Immediate medical attention required. This is a serious condition that needs prompt treatment.

conditions.name: Heart Condition
conditions.recommendation: Immediate emergency medical attention required. Call emergency services if symptoms are severe.
